1: Bemat de bá sè e de sesam o pyak bá sogo yi e bak vwêl Babilɔn, ko yɛn á to ɛn vey e Yɛrusalɛm na vwêl Yuda. Kawɛ e ji mɛn a kwey vɔk e repomo mɛ. Belɔ mɛn ba kana sè sangal e de sesam e vwêl Babilɔn yimo de Gbɔng Gwɔ̀m Nɛbukadnɛzar á kana hashe hɛn vɔk e hwomo e jeng como.
2:
Bemât nuyel mɛn vɛ a Zɛrubabɛl, na Yɛshuwa, na Nɛhɛmiya, na Seraya, na Reelaya, na Mɔrdɛkai, na Bilshan, na Bigvai, na Rehum tanga Baana.
Ngyɛrɛ̂ nepyak BeIsrayɛl a nemo e rùhup mɛn, mwa na nepyak bemat de ba toyo yi e kagwɛ ruhup.
3: Ruhûp Parɔsh — bemat gu baba, na naga gwining kuru bataama na vɛ beba
4: Ruhûp Shefatiya — bemat naga betat na kuru bataama na vɛ beba
5: Ruhûp Ara — bemat naga betaama na kuru bataama na vɛ betungun
6: Ruhûp Pahat-Mowap, yi e lɔ Yɛshuwa na hê Yowap — bemat gu baba na naga rwit kuru rining na vɛ beba
7: Ruhûp Ɛlam — bemat gu rining na naga beba kuru batungun na vɛ benaas
8: Ruhûp Zatu — bemat naga shabetat kuru banaas na vɛ betungun
9: Ruhûp Zakai — bemat naga betaama kuru batyiimin viisis
10: Ruhûp Bani — bemat naga betyiimin kuru banaas na vɛ beba
11: Ruhûp Bebai — bemat naga betyiimin kuru baba na vɛ betat
12: Ruhûp Azgat — bemat gu rining na naga beba kuru baba na vɛ beba
13: Ruhûp Adonikam — bemat naga betyiimin kuru batyiimin na vɛ betyiimin
14: Ruhûp Bikvai — bemat gu baba kuru batungun na vɛ betyiimin
15: Ruhûp Adin — bemat naga benaas kuru batungun na vɛ benaas
16: Ruhûp Ater, de ba to yila hɛ a Hɛzɛkiya — bemat kuru shabatat na vɛ rwit
17: Ruhûp Bezai — bemat naga betat kuru baba na vɛ betat
18: Ruhûp Yora — bemat naga gwining kuru rining na vɛ beba
19: Ruhûp Hashum — bemat naga beba kuru baba na vɛ betat
20: Ruhûp Gibar — bemat kuru shabatat na vɛ betungun
21:
Bemat de bedabeda mɛn bá kana sangal e bapomo vemo bá vɛsɛ hɛn arɔng:
Bemât Bet-Lɛhɛm ba sé naga kuru baba na vɛ betat
22: Bemât Netofa ba sé kuru batungun na vɛ betyiimin
23: Bemât Anatot ba sé naga gwining kuru baba na vɛ rwit
24: Bemât Bet-Azmavɛt ba sé kuru banaas na vɛ beba
25: Bemât Kiriyat-Yɛyarim, Kefira na Bɛɛrɔt ba sé naga betaama kuru banaas na vɛ betat
26: Bemât Rama na Geba ba sé naga betyiimin kuru baba na wɛ gwining
27: Bemât Mikmash ba sé naga gwining kuru baba na vɛ beba
28: Bemât Bet-Ɛl na Ai ba sé naga beba kuru baba na vɛ betat
29: Bemât Nebo ba sé kuru batungun na vɛ beba
30: Bemât Magbish ba sé naga gwining kuru batungun na vɛ betyiimin
31: Bemât Ɛlam ba sé gu rining na naga beba kuru batungun na vɛ benaas
32: Bemât Harim ba sé naga betat kuru baba viisis
33: Bemât Lɔt, na Hadit tanga Ono ba sé naga betaama kuru baba na vɛ betungun
34: Bemât Yeriko ba sé naga betat kuru banaas na vɛ betungun
35: Bemat Senaa ba sé gu batat na naga betyiimin kuru batat viisis
36:
Ngyɛrɛ̂ rùhup bepiris de ba toyo à vemo:
Yi e ruhûp Yɛdaya, yi e lɔ Yɛshuwa — bemat ba sé naga shabetat kuru bataama na vɛ betat
37: Ruhûp Imer — bemat ba sé gu rining kuru batungun na vɛ beba
38: Ruhûp Pash-hur — bemat ba sé gu rining na naga beba kuru banaas na vɛ betaama
39: Ruhûp Harim — bemat ba sé gu rining kuru rining na vɛ betaama
40:
Ngyɛrɛ̂ rùhup BeLevi de ba toyo à vemo:
Yi e ruhûp Yɛshuwa na Kadmiyɛl, yi e lɔ Hɔdaviya — bemat ba sé kuru bataama na vɛ benaas
41: E ji bemât lwɛ̄lɛ Gbɔng Duk Re Fongol, yi e ruhûp Asaf, bemat de ba toyo ba sé naga gwining kuru baba, na vɛ rwit
42: E ji bemât gyêng ri Gbɔng Duk o, yi e rùhup Shalum, na Ater, na Talmɔn, na Akup, na Hatita tanga Shobai, bemat ba sé naga gwining kuru batat na vɛ shabetat
43:
E ji bemât fwôm Gbɔng Duk Re Fongol, ngyɛrɛ̂ bazâ rùhup bemat de ba toyo a vemo:
Rùhup Ziha, na Hasufa tanga Tabayɔt
55:
E ji bemât fwôm Sɔlɔmɔn, ngyɛrɛ̂ bazâ rùhup bemat de ba toyo a vemo:
Rùhup Sotai, na Sɔfɛrɛt na Perida
57: Shefatiya, na Hatil, na Pɔkɛrɛt-Hazɛbayin na Ami
58: Nepyak yére bemât fwôm Gbɔng Duk Re Fongol tanga ne bemât fwôm Sɔlɔmɔn de ba toyo na sé naga betat kuru shabatat na vɛ beba .
60: Bemat naga betyiimin kuru batungun na vɛ beba  yi e rùhup Delaya, na Tobiya na Nekoda ba vey yi e bapomô Tel Mela, na Tel Harsha, na Kɛrup, na Adon tanga Imer, ko yɛn a tɔk dura, belɔ mɛn ba sé yi e yerê BeIsrayɛl wɛt.
62: Ko e ji rùhup bepiris, hàk ba sé arɔng de ba tɔk sè kwɔn de ba jɛk ɛ bazâ nelɔ mɛn wɛt, vɛ a rùhup Hɔbaya, na Hakos na Barzilai. Dâ ruhûp Barzilai, á kana ra wenêng hwông Barzilai wo Gileyat, ko a jut zâ lɔ tyà mɛ. Ko yaga rùhup tat vemo ba tɔk dura, bedabeda mɛn ba sé yi e yére bepiris wɛt, bemât nuyel ba ye, yɛn a jam na be sè bepiris wɛt, ko ba paa ɛn yi e ji mo.
63: Ano kwong, gwɔmna a nɔng ɛn nu be kwon re pyɛ́ de ba nára a Dagwi yɛ wɛt, sɛ̌ ba sɛ̀ piris de e tɔk pyɛ de Dagwi e simo yi na râ Urim na Tumim e ngyen.
64: Mwa nepyak regyɛng bemat de ba toyo mo na sé gu kuru banaas na vɛ baba na naga betat kuru batyiimin viisis ,
65: sana tɛ̀ bemât fwom mɛn beras na beha gu bataama na naga betat kuru batat na vɛ betaama . Yɛn a vɔk bemât lwɛlɛ naga beba  beras na beha mo arɔng.
66: Yɛn a to vɔk bedwa naga betaama kuru batat na vɛ betyiimin , tanga bedwa-madung naga beba kuru banaas na vɛ betungun ,
67: tanga bemaryat naga benaas kuru batat na vɛ betungun , tanga bemadung gu batyiimin na naga betaama kuru baba viisis .
68: Jeng de yɛn a wul Gbɔng Duk Re Fongol wo Dagwi Darwey e Yɛrusalɛm, behak e ji bedanelɔ rùhup o ba nɔng nɔrɔ̂ yey pyɛng, yaga na be to lɔk mɛ Gbɔng Duk o e kwɔn de wá kana sè ɛ.
69: Yɛn a nɔng tyɛng na gap mɛn kilo naga betungun  vê dyam shinang, na kilo gu baba na naga rwit  vê dyam pyɛng tanga berugû bepiris naga gwining . Yɛn a nɔng yɛ e vwɔ̂ mwât bâng yas Gbɔng Duk o.
70: Ano kwong, bepiris, na BeLevi, tanga bwang bemat o behak ba wɔ̀ sangal e Yɛrusalɛm kɛ bagat na wɛ. Bemât lwɛlɛ, na bemât gyêng ri Gbɔng Duk Re Fongol na bemât fwôm Gbɔng Duk o ba wɔ̀ sangal e bapomo vê bagat, ko bwang BeIsrayɛl o ba wɔ̀ sangal e bapomo mɛn.
